evidence.title: README (segment 1)
evidence.excerpt:
agnix

Lint agent configurations before they break your workflow

evidence.title: README (segment 2)
evidence.excerpt:
Catch broken agent configs before your AI tools silently ignore them.
230 rules across Claude Code, Codex CLI, OpenCode, Cursor, Copilot, and more -
validating CLAUDE.md, SKILL.md, hooks, MCP configs, and other agent files.

evidence.title: README (segment 5)
evidence.excerpt: New rules and tool support ship constantly. Follow for real-time updates:

evidence.title: README (segment 6)
evidence.excerpt: **Your skills don't trigger.** Vercel's research found skills [invoke at 0%](https://vercel.com/blog/agents-md-outperforms-skills-in-our-agent-evals) without correct syntax. One wrong field and your skill is invisible.

evidence.title: README (segment 7)
evidence.excerpt: **"Almost right" is the worst outcome.** [66% of developers](https://survey.stackoverflow.co/2025/ai) cite it as their biggest AI frustration. Misconfigured agents produce exactly this.

evidence.title: README (segment 8)
evidence.excerpt: **Multi-tool stacks fail silently.** Cursor + Claude Code + Copilot each want different formats. A config that works in one tool [breaks in another](https://arnav.tech/beyond-copilot-cursor-and-claude-code-the-unbundled-coding-ai-tools-stack).

evidence.title: v0.12.4
evidence.excerpt: ### Security - **Fix minimatch ReDoS vulnerability**: Added npm `overrides` in `website/package.json` to force `minimatch@^10.2.1`, resolving Dependabot alert #75 (ReDoS via repeated wildcards in `serve-handler`'s transitive `minimatch@3.1.2` dependency) - **Update wasm-bindgen**: Bumped `wasm-bindgen` from 0.2.109 (yanked) to 0.2.110 along with related crates (`js-sys`, `web-sys`, `wasm-bindgen-test`, etc.) ### Performance - **WASM conversion optimization**: Refactored `WasmDiagnostic::from_diagnostic` to take ownership of `Diagnostic` and its fields, eliminating unnecessary string cloning when converting diagnostics to the WASM-compatible representation in `agnix-wasm` ### Added - **LSP `pub(crate)` testability refactor**: Made internal modules (`backend`, `code_actions`, `completion_provider`, `diagnostic_mapper`, `hover_provider`, `position`, `vscode_config`) and `Backend` struct fields/methods `pub(crate)` to enable crate-internal test access. Added `Backend::new_test()` constructor (gated behind `#[cfg(test)]`) and 18 new tests in `testability_tests.rs` verifying that all promoted `pub(crate)` items are accessible from the crate root.
